item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-24
item.description: Samsung set to announce new $17 billion advanced chip plant in Texas (3 minute read) Samsung is building a new advanced chip-making plant in Taylor, Texas on a site roughly 1,200 acres in size.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-15
item.description: Facebook Working on Smart Watch to Compete With Apple Watch (2 minute read) Facebook is working on a smart watch that will work without a tethered smartphone.
